data.name: SummaryTextEvaluationSuccessful
data.value: Evaluation was successful.

data.value: Evaluation finished in

data.value: sheet was not evaluated because of an error.

data.name: ToolTipAnswerTableColumns
data.value: The number of columns in an answer table.

data.name: ToolTipAnswerTableRows
data.value: The number of rows in an answer table.

data.name: ToolTipBlackWhiteThreshold
data.value: How bright a shade of grey can be to be recognized as black (the rest will be white).

data.name: ToolTipCellEvaluationType
data.value: TRUE - shape recognition; FALSE - pixel ratio

data.name: ToolTipCrossLineCurvatureLimit
data.value: How curved a line can be to still be recognized as a straight line (1 is minimum).

data.name: ToolTipCrossLineLength
data.value: The length of lines to be detected.

data.name: ToolTipDefaultCellHeight
data.value: Every cell will be resized to have this height.

data.name: ToolTipDefaultCellWidth
data.value: Every cell will be resized to have this width.

data.name: ToolTipDefaultSheetWidth
data.value: Every sheet will be resized accordingly (preserving aspect ratio) before the tables are extracted.

data.name: ToolTipLowerThreshold
data.value: If the ratio of pixels representing student input in the whole cell is lower than this, answer was not chosen.

data.name: ToolTipResizedCellHeight
data.value: This is the height of a cell after the sheet has been resized (see default_sheet_height).

data.name: ToolTipResizedCellWidth
data.value: This is the width of a cell after the sheet has been resized (see default_sheet_width).

data.name: ToolTipRubbishLinesLimit
data.value: Amount of lines that don't form a cross that will be ignored and not considered as a correction.

data.name: ToolTipStudentTableColumns
data.value: The number of columns in the student number table.

data.name: ToolTipStudentTableRows
data.value: The number of rows in the student number table.

data.name: ToolTipTableCount
data.value: The number of tables in the answer sheet.

data.name: ToolTipTableLineCurvatureLimit
data.value: How curved a line can be to still be recognized as a straight line (1 is minimum).

data.name: ToolTipTableLineEccentricityLimit
data.value: How slanted a line can be to be recognized as either horizontal or vertical (in radians).

data.name: ToolTipUpperThreshold
data.value: If the ratio of pixels representing student input in the whole cell is higher than this, answer was invalidated.

data.value: Operation was cancelled.

data.value: Cancelling operation...
